name: Send LinkedIn Lead Gen Forms submission count along with lead details via Gmail
description:
This template periodically retrieves LinkedIn Lead Gen Forms submissions and sends a lead count along with lead details via Gmail.

The template is currently scheduled to run at 9 am every Monday. The template will always send new submissions collected in the last 7 days.

In case you decide to change the lookback window, you will need to adjust the email subject and body to reflect the correct lookback window.
